message: This was bound to happen for us self employed, for years the self employed was business owners, builders etc, now its a kind of tax, pension etc avoidance for businesses, instead of taking people on PAYE they take them on '' a consultancy basis '' to avoid paying the proper taxes etc, i am quite happy to pay my way regarding my NI as its only right, at the end of the day i have chosen to be self employed :)

Is it raising national insurance will cost jobs and hit hardworking taxpayers because that what the tories said would happen and even made it an manifesto pledge 

If you want to know why people vote for Trump and the crazies, it's because manifestos can now be broken at will, so the trust in established politicians and parties will continue to fall.
Why has this never happened when Cl 1 get raised. Employer still pays both parts , their share direct and employees through wages.

In one way or another were all paying more tax. 
Unless your a big company that uses loopholes all over the shop to avoid. Then Hmrc does naff all about it.
Don't worry we are coming to marry all the women in London.  All of them.
